title: Moist Cinnamon Walnut Cake
ingredients: ['250ml soured cream', '175g butter', '300g caster sugar', '315g plain flour', '60g chopped walnuts', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '3 eggs', '1 tablespoon ground cinnamon', '4 tablespoons caster sugar']
